snippet: The special agent for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives was fatally shot after confronting a robbery suspect outside a pharmacy.
abstract: Nassau County police say John Capano, off-duty special agent for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, was fatally shot after confronting a robber outside a pharmacy in Seaford, Long Island; say at least one other law enforcement officer and a retired officer were involved in stopping the assailant, who was also killed at the scene.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and TIM STELLOH

lead_paragraph: The special agent for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives was fatally shot after confronting a robbery suspect outside a pharmacy.

headline.seo: Off-Duty A.T.F. Officer Is Killed After Robbery of Long Island Pharmacy
headline.main: Intervening After Robbery, an Off-Duty A.T.F. Agent Is Killed
headline.print_headline: A.T.F. Officer Is Killed After a Pharmacy Robbery on Long Island

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
